decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to quickly generate mana and play combo pieces to win the game in a single turn. By utilizing fast mana sources like Lion's Eye Diamond and Lotus Petal, along with powerful spells like Burning Wish and Gamble, the deck can assemble the necessary pieces to execute a game-winning combo. The inclusion of cards like Defense Grid and City of Traitors helps to protect the combo and facilitate explosive plays. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its speed and efficiency, enabling it to achieve victory before the opponent can react effectively.

This deck aims to aggressively lock down the opponent's mana base by using cards like Magus of the Moon, Blood Moon, and Chalice of the Void. It also utilizes fast mana acceleration with cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide to quickly deploy threats like Broadside Bombardiers and Fury. The deck's goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with its efficient creatures and burn spells, ultimately overwhelming them with a quick and powerful offense.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently combo off by utilizing a combination of creatures, spells, and mana acceleration. The deck aims to mill through its own library, while also making use of graveyard recursion to eventually win the game with a combo finish. Key cards include Balustrade Spy, Undercity Informer, and Dread Return, along with plenty of fast mana in the form of cards like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide. The deck also includes disruption in the form of cards like Thoughtseize and Pact of Negation to protect its combo.

This deck focuses on quickly assembling the combo of Doomsday and Thassa's Oracle to win the game. The deck includes cards like Lotus Petal, Dark Ritual, and Cabal Ritual to ramp up mana quickly, along with cantrips like Ponder and Brainstorm to dig for combo pieces. Personal Tutor can search for Doomsday, while Veil of Summer protects against disruption. The deck also includes cards like Consider and Street Wraith for additional card selection. Overall, the main goal is to set up the Doomsday combo and win the game in a single turn.

The main focus of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Lotus Petal and Eye of Ugin, while disrupting opponents with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck aims to pressure opponents with aggressive Eldrazi creatures like Devourer of Destiny and Glaring Fleshraker, backed up by powerful spells like Kozilek's Command. The deck also includes land destruction elements with Wasteland and creature removal with Sowing Mycospawn. Overall, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with fast mana acceleration and powerful Eldrazi threats in order to secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing combo pieces like Nadu, Winged Wisdom, Nomads en-Kor, and Shaman en-Kor to create a powerful, efficient engine that can quickly overwhelm opponents. The deck includes key cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Chord of Calling to tutor for essential pieces, as well as cards like Natural Order and Craterhoof Behemoth for explosive finishes. The inclusion of cards like Allosaurus Shepherd and Endurance provide protection and disruption against opposing strategies, while cards like Gaea's Cradle and Noble Hierarch help ramp and accelerate the deck's game plan.

The main strategy of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, then bring them back to the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. This combo-focused deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with high-impact creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck also includes disruption spells like Daze and Thoughtseize to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Fatal Push and Brazen Borrower provide removal options to deal with threats on the opponent's side of the board.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana with Gaea's Cradle and mana dorks like Noble Hierarch to quickly play powerful creature threats like Wight of the Reliquary and Craterhoof Behemoth. Natural Order is used to tutor for key creatures, while Endurance provides graveyard disruption. The deck also runs disruptive elements like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Collector Ouphe to control the board. With a mix of land tutors and powerful creatures, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its mana acceleration and strong creature threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently get powerful creatures from the graveyard onto the battlefield, using cards like Animate Dead, Reanimate, Shallow Grave, and Entomb. By discarding big creatures like Archon of Cruelty, Valgavoth, Terror Eater, Atraxa, Grand Unifier, and Griselbrand, the deck can cheat them into play early and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats. Thoughtseize, Cabal Therapy, and Unmask provide disruption and protection for the combo pieces, while Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal help accelerate the deck's explosive plays.

This deck focuses on quickly disrupting your opponent by playing disruptive artifacts like blood moon and chalice of the void, while also playing powerful red creatures like Magus of the Moon and Broadside Bombardiers to pressure your opponent. The deck aims to lock your opponent out of their mana base, while you quickly close out the game with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The high amount of mana acceleration allows you to play your powerful spells ahead of schedule, overwhelming your opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main concept of this Aluren combo deck is to utilize the card Aluren to cast creatures with a converted mana cost of 3 or less for free. The deck includes a variety of low-cost creatures, such as Cavern Harpy and Ice-Fang Coatl, as well as control elements like Abrupt Decay and Force of Will to protect the combo. By consistently casting creatures for free and drawing cards with Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with card advantage and efficient plays.
